signature.instructions: Examine the provided image of a capsule carefully. Analyze the image to detect any visible defects and classify the capsule into one of the categories: crack, scratch, poke, faulty_imprint, squeeze, or good. Provide a detailed reasoning of your analysis, explaining each step that leads to your final classification.

fields.description: path to an image to be classified

fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to
